name: vegeteball
description:
CONTROLS (keyboard only*):

DOWN ARROW: plunger

LEFT ARROW: left flippers

RIGHT ARROW: right flipper

SHIFT: both

this is an accurate and comprehensive look at what worms do in their extremely limited free time

(*okay technically you can play it on your phone but it's kind of a hack and the camera really isn't set up for it

flippers are left or right tap, respectively, plunger is the center)
